programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Dramatic Car Chases
programme.desc: Witness extreme car chases captured on video, from fleeing via fire truck to off-roading into a corn field. Fortunately no one is seriously hurt – except, at times, the vehicles.

programme.title: One Pill Can Kill
programme.desc: Told through the voices of grieving parents, this documentary follows the real and lasting impact of the fentanyl crisis. Capturing the aftermath of sudden loss, the search for answers, and the transformation of grief into public advocacy.

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.sub-title: What's On The Menu, Greenville? Sweet Tooth
programme.desc: Baking and confections are a science. These Greenville sweet spots, Brick Street Cafe, Buttermilk Sky Pie, Better Than Sex, and Old Europe Cafe show us how they get the chemistry in their flavors exactly right!

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Glenda Macatangay has conquered her career and being a single mom to four kids. But when it comes to being comfortable in the outdoors, she isn’t as confident. Kinga meets up with Glenda in Sacramento, CA to introduce her to the wonders of the wilderness.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Ready To Settle Down
programme.desc: Luke is a Kansas City bachelor who is finally ready to settle down. He’s purging the dating apps and hoping to find the perfect match. He’ll meet three blind dates as they play pickleball, get their shuffleboard on and visit a llama farm.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Cristina Quackenbush of Milkfish takes on Chef Jennifer Cole of Laurel Oak in a blindfold battle of international influences! They may not have matched on a dating app, but in the kitchen it’s a match-up for the ages.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Couples Committing Wild Crimes
programme.desc: A duo pulls a Bonnie and Clyde in a truck stolen from a dealership, and a pair takes money from a monastery. These shocking stories of couples in crime have to be witnessed to be believed.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It!: Best Buds Become Culinary Competitors in Small Town Toss-Up
programme.desc: Long time chef friends Kisha Washington and Brian Hohl compete in this Smaltimore small plates challenge. Can these small town friends handle a big screen competition?

programme.title: Widowed At 19
programme.desc: Two high school sweethearts had their love story cut too short.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Re-creating Korean-Fried Quail vs. Puerto Rican Cordon Bleu
programme.desc: In this battle, it’s a head chef showdown. Chef Brandon Basista of Bearded Chef food truck faces off with Chef Alex Diaz of Alex’s Fresh Kitchen in Casselberry. It's a battle of the beards on this episode of Blind Kitchen.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Boston Rob Does Beantown & Beyond: The Great Indoors
programme.desc: What’s vast, adventure-packed, and sunscreen-free? Boston’s great indoors! Rob tries his hand at everything from indoor surfing to skydiving on his day in.

programme.title: Maker Nation
programme.desc: A festive headpiece in New Orleans, and wooden toy making in Omaha.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.sub-title: Maker Nation Challenge: Designers Wow Judges with Mardi Gras Marvels
programme.desc: Costumes are a part of the fabric that makes up New Orleans. As three local designers will find out – nothing is easy in the Big Easy as they compete in creating one-of-a-kind costumes inspired by the Crescent City and the river that shapes it.

programme.title: In Transit by Esquire
programme.desc: Join Esquire’s Dave Holmes as he chats with award-winning musician, Dermot Kennedy, and toasts all things Cincinnati.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot: Marvel Actor, TikTok Fitness Mom, & Top Comedian Find Thrills at Theme Park
programme.desc: Our local experts know the best thrills at Fun Spot. Orlando’s top comedian braves the gravity-defying SkyCoaster, a monster DJ and actor can’t stop screaming on White Lightning, and an influencer leaves all her followers behind on the go-kart track.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It, Pittsburgh!: Date Night Delights
programme.desc: Chefs Jason Taylor and Adam Stayrook will have to chef to impress in today’s Date Night Delights challenge. Will their fancy meals delight the judges? Or will this be a date they wanna forget?

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Funny Girl Looks For Someone To Make Her Laugh
programme.desc: Gabi is a true triple-threat who isn’t afraid to crack a joke on these three blind dates. Which gentleman will tickle this leading lady’s funny bone the most?

programme.title: Absolutely Albuquerque
programme.sub-title: Absolutely Albuquerque : Painting the Town Red
programme.desc: Don't miss this drag-tastic adventure as Amanda and ABQ legend, Marcus Montoya, AKA Vanessa Patricks, put their best feet forward. Together, they'll learn some killer moves, and toast to an iconic evening on Albuquerque's most inclusive stage.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Oklahoma Girl Scout Murders
programme.desc: As Girl Scouts at Camp Scott settle into their tents one evening, eerie footsteps and distant cries haunt the campers throughout the night. The unsettling sounds turn out to be the echos one of the largest murder investigations in Oklahoma's history.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: The Strangest Situations to Ever Go Down at Police Stations
programme.desc: A fugitive escapes through the ceiling. A man plows his car into the police station. These shocking stories prove cops don't even have to leave the building to encounter the unpredictable.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: 10 Heartwarming Tales of Technology Changing Lives
programme.desc: From the internet to artificial intelligence, modern technology has made a massive mark on our society. This episode of Stitch dives into all the ways technology can improve our lives and make a positive impact.

programme.title: Key Bridge Disaster: Reflect, Recover, Rebuild
programme.desc: "Key Bridge Disaster: Reflect, Recover, Rebuild," examines the lives impacted in the hours, days and months following the collapse, telling the stories of first responders, workers at the Port of Baltimore, business owners and employees, and the people living in nearby communities.

programme.title: Juvenile Lifers: Road to Redemption
programme.desc: (2019) Juvenile Lifers: Road to Redemption focuses on people who were sentenced to life in prison as juveniles. WGAL News 8's Matt Barcaro examines how these these former offenders are re-entering society and the reaction from victims' families.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Fried and Tried Midwest Foods to Excite Your Palate
programme.desc: Dive into the Midwest's fried delights. From Friday night fish fries to tasty testicles and fried grilled cheese? Enjoy the area's most iconic and delectable crispy fried goodness.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Kind-Hearted 10-year-old Gets Showered With Thanks
programme.desc: Catalina, a 10-year-old community hero with a heart of gold spends her days giving back. Today, Meaghan surprises Catalina with a day of her own, from Sea adventures to a new set of wheels and more. It's her time to shine.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.title: West By Orphan Train
programme.desc: A gripping documentary uncovering real stories of children loaded on trains, sent west, and presented “for the picking.” From 1854 to 1929, over 6,000 children landed in Iowa communities. Discover their emotional journeys and impact on the Midwest.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.desc: Host and comedic actor Amy Brassette McKeon challenges two sets of couples to pass a good time on a dime in their city. Find out which couple will experience the most amazing date for under fifty bucks.

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.desc: Join WNBA player and Olympian Angel McCoughtry as she shows us the people and places that put Baltimore on the map. From sailing the Chesapeake, to sampling street foods, McCoughtry pulls back the curtain on what makes the Charm City so special.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.title: In Transit by Esquire
programme.desc: Host Dave Holmes meets celebrity guests at the airport bar to discuss must-do activities in cities across America. So when you’re ready to board your next flight, you’ll have an Esquire-approved itinerary.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Stitch showcases the feel-good and do-good that make up the fabric of America from inspiring tales of perseverance, to good Samaritans helping neighbors, to trailblazers improving their communities.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.desc: Join host Rob Mariano, also known as Boston Rob from the Survivor series, as he explores the best of Beantown from classic institutions to new local gems.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: FIXT
programme.sub-title: FIXT: Mom With Traumatic Past Wants To Smile Again
programme.desc: A horrific accident doomed Allison to a lifetime of pain and failed surgeries. In search of a brighter smile, Mar-cia’s seen half a dozen dentists, but remains unsatisfied. Can FIXT tech meet the needs of their deserving clients?

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Stitch showcases the feel-good and do-good that make up the fabric of America from inspiring tales of perseverance, to good Samaritans helping neighbors, to trailblazers improving their communities.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Serial Killer on F Street
programme.desc: A man vanishes from a boarding house in 1988. The fight to find him uncovers one of the most shocking cases in Sacramento history and the surprising revelation of a grandmotherly-looking serial killer hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.desc: In this game show, comedian Frank Nicotero hits the streets to ask people questions inspired by the wildest news stories for a chance at winning a cash prize. These real-life stories with unreal outcomes will make you say, “Wait, What Happened?"
